alert.note: Alert for Eau Claire (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 6:38PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...URBAN AND SMALL STREAM FLOODING EXPECTED... Heavy rain will cause minor flooding in the following counties... Eau Claire... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 637 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain that will cause urban and small stream flooding in the area. Three inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Eau Claire, Fall Creek, Foster, Brackett, and Allen.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.
